Reference

Creating Hillshades

Functions for generating hillshades

ambient_shade()

Calculate Ambient Occlusion Map

cloud_shade()

Cloud Shade

constant_shade()

Calculate Constant Color Map

height_shade()

Calculate Terrain Color Map

lamb_shade()

Calculate Lambert Shading Map

ray_shade()

Calculate Raytraced Shadow Map

sphere_shade()

Calculate Surface Color Map

texture_shade()

Calculate Texture Shading Map

create_texture()

Create Texture

Generate Label Overlay

Generate Point Overlay

Generate Polygon Overlay

generate_scalebar_overlay()

Generate Scalebar Overlay

generate_waterline_overlay()

Generate Waterline Overlay

detect_water()

Detect water

Add Overlay

add_shadow()

Add Shadow

add_water()

Add Water

Plotting and Saving 2D and 3D Visualizations

Functions for displaying/saving 2D visualizations and 3D prints/models

Plot 3D

Transform ggplot2 objects into 3D

plot_map()

Plot Map

save_3dprint()

Save 3D Print

Save MULTIPOLYGON Z sf data to OBJ file

save_obj()

Save OBJ

save_png()

Save PNG

convert_path_to_animation_coords()

Calculate Animation Coordinates from Path

convert_rgl_to_raymesh()

Convert RGL to ray_mesh

Helper functions for manipulating rasters

Helper functions to manipulate and simplify rasters.

calculate_normal()

Calculate Normal

raster_to_matrix()

Raster to Matrix

resize_matrix()

Resize Matrix

reduce_matrix_size()

Reduce Matrix Size (deprecated)

Included Data

Elevation data included with rayshader

montereybay

Monterey Bay combined topographic and bathymetric elevation matrix.

monterey_counties_sf

California County Data Around Monterey Bay

monterey_roads_sf

Road Data Around Monterey Bay

washington_monument_multipolygonz

Washington Monument 3D Model as Multipolygon Z Data

flag_banner_obj()

Flag Banner 3D Model

flag_full_obj()

Flag 3D Model

flag_pole_obj()

Flag Pole 3D Model

pkgdown utils

Internal but must be exported to meet CRAN guidelines

run_documentation()

Run Documentation
